title: D2 ADC main LFT.
body:
Looking to try for OCS this OOL. Decent Exp in Team play, and Previously played in OCS. Add me in game for more info!

IGN: minigorophin

replies.body: I am currently lurking and seeking out people ~ I currently have one very skilled player. I have added you in game to discuss this futher, I will try to be on all day so that you are able to reach me.
